entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
